  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    CannotJoinGameException
    Exception thrown when an attempt to join a game fails because the game's status is not WAITING.
    CardNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a specified card is not found in the game.
    DeskIsFullException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to add a card to a desk that is already full.
    NoMoreCardException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to draw a card from an empty deck.
    NoSuchGameException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to interact with a game that does not exist.
    PlayerAlreadyJoinedException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to add a player to a game when the player is already part of the game.
